name: 李永山
objective: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、程式語言、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、資料通訊與網路等。
schedule:
week
Computers: tools for an information age	ch1	1
Application and Operating system          	ch2-3    2
CPU and I/O + digital data format	         ch4-5	3
Storage & media      			ch6   	5
PPT & Word                           	ch11	6
Network & Internet			         ch7-8	7
    HW1: Preparation for homepage (word and PPT)
    Quiz1: digital data and Computer Org.
MSN and Skype				         7
Security				         ch10	8
Mid exam					         9
Frontpage					         10-11
      HW2: HTML (frontpage)
System analysis & programming		ch14, 15	12
      Quiz2: network security
MIS					ch16	13
Data Base Management System & Access	ch13	         14-17
Final exam					18
scorePolicy:
Small Quiz + Homework       40% 
Mid + final exam            60%
materials:
計算機概論—資訊時代利器—滄海—陳玄玲編譯
Computers: Tools for An Information Age, 8 ed., Capron, H. L., Johnson, J. A., —Pearson Education, Inc.
Ref. Book:
計算機概論—全華—趙坤茂等
Office 2007使用手冊—施威銘研究室—旗標
Access 2007使用手冊—施威銘研究室—旗標
